subsidies.name: SBA 7(a) Loan Subsidy
subsidies.description: Interest rate subsidy up to 2.75% for eligible SMBs.

subsidies.name: Work Opportunity Tax Credit (WOTC)
subsidies.description: Up to $9,600 in credits for hiring from specific disadvantaged groups.

subsidies.name: R&D Tax Credit
subsidies.description: Credit of up to 14% on qualified R&D expenditures.

subsidies.name: Disabled Access Credit
subsidies.description: Up to $5,000 in credits for improving physical access to business locations.

subsidies.name: Energy Efficiency Deduction (179D)
subsidies.description: Up to $5/sqft deduction for energy-efficient buildings or upgrades.

subsidies.name: Business Rates Discount
subsidies.description: Up to 100% rates relief on business properties.

subsidies.name: Employer National Insurance Contributions
subsidies.description: A reduction in National insurance contributions for employers.

subsidies.name: VAT Flat Rate Scheme
subsidies.description: Flat rate scheme to help small businesses.

subsidies.name: Small business contingency fund for provinces and territories
subsidies.description: Provides up to $5M/province/year in contingent funding for SMBs experiencing hardship as a result of COVID-19.

subsidies.name: Canada emergency wage subsidy (CEWS)
subsidies.description: A temporary CEWS of 75% of employee salaries paid by employers to eligible employees during the COVID-19 pandemic.

subsidies.name: Canada emergency rent subsidy (CERS)
subsidies.description: A temporary CERS of 65% of rent for qualifying small businesses, nonprofits, and charities retroactive to March 17, 2020.

subsidies.name: Employment Insurance sickness benefit reform measures
subsidies.description: Extends the maximum duration of Employment Insurance sickness benefits from 15 weeks to 26 weeks.

subsidies.name: Small business instant asset write-off
subsidies.description: Allows small businesses to immediately deduct the cost of eligible assets.

subsidies.name: Productivity and Innovation Credit (PIC)
subsidies.description: Tax incentives for qualifying activities and investments.

subsidies.name: SME Cash Grant
subsidies.description: Cash grants for small and medium enterprises to support business growth.

subsidies.name: KfW Bank subsidy
subsidies.description: Subsidy paid by German state-owned development bank to encourage lending to small business; interest rate subsidy, repayable if loan goes into default.

deductions.name: Housing allowance - rent or mortgage interest

subsidies.name: SME working capital loan subsidy scheme SCPCE
subsidies.description: Subsidized working capital loans for SMEs.

subsidies.name: Prime minister's entrepreneurship plan
subsidies.description: Subsidized microcredits for start-ups and young entrepreneurs to finance business projects.

subsidies.name: Startup India Initiative
subsidies.description: Tax exemptions and incentives for eligible startups for the first three years.

subsidies.name: MSME Credit Guarantee Scheme
subsidies.description: Collateral-free loans up to Rs 2 crore for micro, small and medium enterprises.

subsidies.name: Small and Medium Enterprise Tax Credits
subsidies.description: Reduced corporate tax rates for qualifying small and medium enterprises.

subsidies.name: R&D Tax Credit
subsidies.description: Tax credits for research and development expenses incurred by SMEs.

subsidies.name: Simples Nacional
subsidies.description: Simplified tax regime for micro and small enterprises with reduced tax rates.

subsidies.name: BNDES Credit Lines
subsidies.description: Subsidized credit lines from the national development bank for SME working capital and investment.

subsidies.name: Microentrepreneur Individual (MEI)
subsidies.description: Special tax regime for individual microentrepreneurs with fixed monthly tax payments.
